tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluator VARCHAR(100),
    evaluation_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE impact_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessed_policy_id INT,
    assessment_report TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_owners (
    policy_owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_owner_email VARCHAR(100),
    department VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_evaluations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluator_name VARCHAR(255),
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE impact_assessments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessed_by VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE evaluation_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    impact_assessment_id INT,
    result TEXT,
    assessment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE evaluation_reports(
	evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	evaluation_date DATE,
	evaluation_type VARCHAR(50),
	evaluator_id INT,
	score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE impact_assessments(
	assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	assessment_date DATE,
	assessed_entity VARCHAR(100),
	impact_factor FLOAT,
	impact_score FLOAT,
	evaluator_id INT
);
